chapter.title: Logging in
chapter.para: To log in to the Tamboti framework, click Login and enter the username and password you use to access the Cluster IT resources.
Your password is not stored in the database, but sent to the Heidelberg University Active Directory to be authenticated.
After logging in, you see the username you are logged in under in the upper right corner, with an option to log out again. For safety reasons, always log out when you wish to terminate your session.

Your session lasts 30 minutes. After 25 minutes of inactivity you are presented with a warning that your session is about to expire. If you do not respond to this within five minutes, you will be logged out. Unsaved changes will be lost. Your list in My List and your search history will be lost.

Sessions are expired because the database maintains a lot of information about your search results in order to make browsing faster, and it can become a strain on the database server if too many sessions are running.
